Articles.Content:
Not sure if others have noticed this, but since 0.13, when you can stick fuel tanks to other fuel tanks on the side, it\'s become more difficult to attach, say, 3 stacks of three fuel tanks on top of each other on a tricoupler, because if it\'s slightly off, they look like they\'re stuck but have just attached to the other tanks.

Anyone have any ways around this or tips to avoid it?

The ability to attach fuel tanks directly to other fuel tanks has pretty much made the tricoupler redundant. Just attach the 3 fuel tanks directly to a central tank, and hook them all up to the central tank with fuel lines. You\'ll get the same functionality but with less redundant mass and drag.
Does this apply to solid boosters as well?
This has to be moved to 'KSP Development'
